lead_paragraph: A volunteer sheriff’s deputy plans to vacation in the Bahamas while facing a second-degree manslaughter charge in Tulsa, his lawyers told a judge Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Sheriff’s Deputy Charged in Killing Is Headed to the Bahamas
headline.main: Oklahoma: Sheriff’s Deputy Charged in Killing Is Headed to the Bahamas

snippet: A volunteer sheriff’s deputy plans to vacation in the Bahamas while facing a second-degree manslaughter charge in Tulsa, his lawyers told a judge Tuesday.
abstract: Robert Bates, volunteer sheriff's deputy facing second-degree manslaughter charge for shooting death of black man Eric Harris in Tulsa, Okla, will take planned Bahamas vacation with family ahead of July court date; Harris' family has criticized plan.
